Load configuration and print data:

```{python}
from bluprint_conf import load_data_yaml

data = load_data_yaml()

# Print file name
print(data['example'])

# Print file contents
with open(data['example'], 'r') as example_file:
  for line in example_file:
    print(line.strip().replace(',', '\t'))
```
